Instance.description: This interaction will spin up the family meal situation.

TunableVariant.name: host_sim
TunableVariant.description: The participant type that will be made the host. If disabled, the host will be None which is okay in circumstances where there is no need for a host (i.e. a walkbye or a ghost situation).

TunableList.name: enabled
TunableList.description: The participant type that will be made the host.

Tunable.name: invite_only
Tunable.description: If checked then the situation guest list will be invite only.

TunableList.name: job_mapping
TunableList.description: This is a mapping of participant type to situation job. These must match up with the jobs in the actual situation.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: The participant type that will be given this job.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The situation job applied to this participant type. This MUST be a valid job for the situation.

Tunable.name: situation
Tunable.description: The situation to launch upon execution of this interaction.

TunableVariant.name: ui_options
TunableVariant.description: Options for setting up the situation UI.

TunableTuple.name: user_facing
TunableTuple.description: Enable the user facing situation UI, displaying the situation name, goals, and scoring where appropriate.

Tunable.name: scoring_enabled
Tunable.description: If disabled, will only show the situation name and time.
